name: Bandipur Yatayat
description: Reliable bus service connecting Gaindakot to Bandipur via Bharatpur with modern amenities and scenic mountain views.

name: Pokhara Hill Express
description: Fast minibus service from Bandipur to Pokhara offering frequent departures and comfortable seating with valley views.

name: Gorkha Heritage Taxi
description: Private taxi service connecting Bandipur to historic Gorkha with professional drivers and flexible stops.

name: Scenic Route Bus
description: Extended bus journey from Bharatpur to Pokhara via Bandipur with semi-deluxe seating and cultural landmarks.

name: Kathmandu Valley Express
description: Direct bus service from Hetauda to Kathmandu via major highways with comfortable seating and AC facilities.

name: Mahendra Highway Liner
description: Long-distance bus connecting Birgunj to Butwal through Bharatpur and Bharatpur with multiple stops.

name: Lumbini Pilgrim Bus
description: Dedicated bus service from Butwal to Lumbini via Tilottama for pilgrims and tourists visiting the birthplace of Buddha.

name: Annapurna Circuit Jeep
description: Rugged jeep service from Besisahar to Chame for trekkers heading to Annapurna Circuit with mountain terrain expertise.

name: Mustang Desert Wind
description: Specialized jeep service from Beni to Jomsom through rugged mountain terrain with experienced drivers.

name: Tansen Hill Climb
description: Minibus service from Butwal to Tansen navigating winding hill roads with scenic valley views.

name: Baglung Hill Connect
description: Regular bus service connecting Pokhara to Baglung via Waling and Kusma with hill station stops.

name: Sindhupalchok Mountain Taxi
description: Private taxi service from Kathmandu to Chautara for travelers visiting earthquake-affected areas and mountain communities.

name: Dolakha Heritage Route
description: Bus service connecting Chautara to Charikot for visitors exploring Dolakha's cultural heritage and mountain scenery.

name: Langtang Valley Express
description: Jeep service from Bidur to Dhunche gateway for Langtang National Park with trekking gear transport.

name: Dhading Rural Connect
description: Local bus service from Nilkantha to various villages in Dhading district with affordable rural transportation.

name: Ramechhap Rural Link
description: Minibus service connecting Kamalamai to Manthali for rural communities and local market access.

name: Dang Valley Rider
description: Inter-district bus service from Ghorahi to Tulsipur serving the fertile Dang valley region.

name: Terai Border Express
description: Express bus service from Tulsipur to Nepalgunj connecting mid-western Nepal with the Indian border.

name: Kavre Valley Cruiser
description: Local minibus connecting Banepa to Dhulikhel and Panauti for valley exploration and day trips.

name: Chitwan Safari Shuttle
description: Tourist-focused minibus from Bharatpur to Ratnanagar for visitors to Chitwan National Park.

name: Pokhara Lake Taxi
description: Premium taxi service around Pokhara connecting main city to Lekhnath and lakeside areas.

name: Lamjung Circle Route
description: Circular bus route connecting Damauli to Sundarbazar serving local communities in Lamjung district.
